newsitem.title: GREECE: GREEK XIOSBANK CUTS DEPOSIT RATES BY 50 BASIS PTS.
newsitem.headline: GREEK XIOSBANK CUTS DEPOSIT RATES BY 50 BASIS PTS.

text.p: Xiosbank said on Monday that it cut its deposit rates by 50 basis points in line with falling interest rates. Xiosbank reviews its rates weekly.
Its Xios-Alma deposit account offers rates up to 12.95 percent until September 2 and monthly interest payments, it said.
The base rate for business credit stands at 20.25 percent, it said. --Dimitris Kontogiannis, Athens Newsroom +301 3311812-4
